artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Blue, blue/green & olive warp. Blue, blue/green and metallic green weft.  Plain weave variation . Stapled to glossy,8.5x11" Larsen card.  "H-8B" written at top. "5" under textile.
